name: Animal Encyclopedia Complete Reference Guide Free
description: Colette said, Our perfect companions never have fewer than four feet. Animal Encyclopedia Offline App is an amazing Animal Guide with interesting facts related to animals weight, classification, behaviour, habitat, conservation and more. The app has Animal Categories, Puzzles, Facts, Quiz and EduBank. With more than 3600 entities under 18 Categories, this Animal Encyclopedia Complete Reference Guide is very useful and handy for all the animal lovers. Enjoy an amazing journey into the world of animals with all new facts related to them.  Animal Encyclopedia Offline App has 18 Categories. These are:-  * Mammals * Birds * Fish * Reptiles * Insects * Amphibians * Aquatic Animals * Marine Animals * Molluscans * Joint-Legged Insects * Centipedes * Snails & Slugs * Vert * Spongiae * Anthozoa * Crustaceans * Lissamphibians * Sea Urchins  Additional Features of Animal Encyclopedia Complete Reference Guide are:-  * Contribute - If you find that something is missing from this app regarding Animals, contribute it now and it will be updated. * EduBank - EduBank is a safe deposit of your learnings. Save it here to refer anytime! * Quiz - Challenge your knowledge about Animals with exciting Quiz. Timer keeps the excitement on and on. * Puzzle - Tired of reading? Take some time off and play some exciting puzzles.  Get unlimited access to the world of animals with Animal Encyclopedia Complete Reference Guide Offline. Know in and out about the common and unique animal species.  We make SMARTY apps, Simple Masterly Approach to Refine Thinking for YOU.
